title: The 9 Edgar Allan Poe Stories You Should Read Before Fall Of The House Of Usher
description:
The 9 Edgar Allan Poe Stories You Should Read Before Fall Of The House Of Usher


Horror maestro Mike Flanagan (The Haunting of Hill House, Midnight Mass) is bringing us to somewhere both newer and older with his latest show, The Fall of the House of Usher. Set in the modern day and connected to some real-world issues, The Fall of the House of Usher follows the Usher family and their corporation, Fortunato Pharmaceutical. While all the episodes are connected, though, they're based on separate stories by legendary American poet and author Edgar Allan Poe.

Each episode--with one exception--is named after one of Poe's stories, with many of them find ways to closely follow the plot of those original stories with a modern spin. The one deviation is the first episode, titled, "A Midnight Dreary." This, obviously, is a reference to Poe

description:

title: Disney CEO Pushed To Consider "Bolder Transformation" In Gaming - Report
description:
Disney executives reportedly wanted to become a gaming giant and considered acquiring Electronic Arts. However, Disney CEO Bob Iger isn’t committed to the idea.

According to Bloomberg, "Iger’s deputies are pushing him to consider a bolder transformation of Disney from gaming licensee to gaming giant through, say, an acquisition of Electronic Arts. But, as with everything else, he’s been noncommittal."

Disney was in the game publishing business until 2016, when it closed Avalanche Software and then proceeded to license out its properties to other developers. In recent years, Disney licensed games include Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and Jedi: Survivor, as well as Return to Monkey Island. Furthermore, Dis

title: This Dark Souls Tabletop Game Is 50% Off At Amazon For Prime Day Round 2
description: Prime Day Round 2 has brought plenty of enticing board game deals, including popular Star Wars miniatures core sets and big discounts on games borne from video games. Yes, we're talking about the official Bloodborne board game and two of its expansion sets. If you can't get enough of Bloodborne, you can also grab the official card ga

title: Kirby (And You) Can Return To Dream Land On Switch For Only $40 At Amazon
description:
One of the year's most charming Nintendo Switch games is on sale for its best price yet at Amazon for Prime Day Round 2. Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe is only $40, down from $60, until the end of today, October 11. If you're looking for a family-friendly game to gift this holiday, Kirby's colorful side-scrolling adventure is a solid option.

See at Amazon

A remastered port of a 2011 Nintendo Wii game, Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe was a turning point for the franchise. The first Kirby game to use a 2.5D graphical style that has been used in several other Kirby games since then, Return to Dream Land also features co-op gameplay with up to three other players and playable characters such as King

Virtually every major retailer has Madden 24 on sale right now, but Amazon has the best price. The previous low for the latest entry in the long-running football sim series was $49 (last week).

Get deal for PS5
Get deal for Xbox

Madden 24 released in mid-August, so you're getting nearly

title: Latest Star Wars Jedi: Survivor Patch Fixes Animation Issues
description:
Another patch for Star Wars Jedi: Survivor has arrived, with animation fixes and a couple improvements for when ray tracing is disabled.

The patch notes are not specific, but claim that the update repairs creature and vehicle animations. The other changes only come into play when ray tracing is turned off. Binocular beacons will now work properly even when ray tracing is disabled, and the general quality of non-ray-traced reflections has been improved. Other fixes could be part of the patch, but are not listed in the patch notes.

Jedi: Survivor launched with a variety of performance issues, especially on PC. Several patches released over the months after launch improved both console and PC performance. One patch in particular

title: Save On These Pokemon Building Kits During Amazon Prime Big Deal Days
description:
You can save up to 35% on select Pokemon building kits from Mega during Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days sale. The sets are all official Pokemon merch, and the pieces are compatible with certain other popular plastic brick-building brands, too.

The discounted kits include playsets like the 1362-piece Pokemon Jungle Voyage set, which includes mini Squirtle, Butterfree, Kabuto, and Rowlet figures for $71 (was $1

title: These Budget Gaming Desks Are Even Cheaper During Prime Day Round 2
description:
Finding a reliable gaming desk doesn’t have to cost a fortune. In fact, if you don’t mind veering away from big-name brands like Secretlab and FlexiSpot, it’s possible to find a great desk for less than $200. These affordable gaming desks are even cheaper during Prime Big Deal Days (Prime Day Round 2), with many offering some of the lowest prices we’ve seen in 2023.

If you’re on a tight budget (or working with a small room), consider looking at the HLDirect 47-Inch Gaming Desk. Equipped with LED lights, a cupholder, and a headphone hook, it’s a well-rounded product despite its rock-bottom price. Typically sold for $139, you can get it for $78 during Prime Day Round 2.

title: Dan Harmon Wants A Rick And Morty Movie (And So Does Zack Snyder)
description:
Dan Harmon has an unexpected ally in Zack Snyder for a possible--and still very hypothetical--upcoming Rick and Morty movie. In an interview with The Hollywood Reporter, the Rick and Morty co-creator revealed that Snyder has a good deal of enthusiasm for a film-length adaptation.

According to Harmon, the Justice League director asked for a meeting to discuss a possible Rick and Morty movie. "Not him saying, 'I get to do it,' or anything like that," Harmon said. "He was totally a super fan and was just like, 'Is there any way I can help get that movie started by using my Snyder-ness?'"

Harmon also joked, "So, the Rick and Morty movie is coming as soon as Zack Snyder gets back from his vacation, because I want to start with a Snyder cut of that movie and then I want to do the director's cut of a Snyder cut release, so

title: Dead Island 2 Haus Story Expansion Launches In November
description:
Dambuster Studios and Deep Silver have announced that Dead Island 2's first story expansion, Haus, will launch on November 2.

In this expansion, players will investigate a mysterious Malibu cult. The cult's leader, Konstantin, is a billionaire who hosts death-cult fights and it's up to players to stop him. Haus takes place in Malibu, which is a brand-new location for Dead Island 2. This new area is home to multiple labyrinths with various biomes.

There are also new weapons available, such as the K-Rossbow that has long-range firepower and causes zombie brains to explode, while the Hog Roaster seems to have some sort of flamethrower component. Additionally, there are eight new skill cards for players to earn.

Continue Reading at Ga

title: CoD: Warzone And MW2 Patch Notes Address Problematic Gaia Skin And OP Lockwood 300
description:
The latest update has arrived to Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 and Warzone. The October 11 patch notes include some weapon balancing for Warzone and adjustments to Season 6's most frustrating operator skin.

Season 6 includes a battle pass mostly themed around characters from the Spawn universe, but there's also a Gaia operator skin with a Groot-like appearance. The tree character is a dark wood with quite a bit of transparency around the torso and legs that has caused some major visibility issues. Thankfully, the patch notes mention "improved visibility compensation" and the addition of visual effects to the base skin to reflect the same level of visibility as the BlackCell variant of Gaia.

Several weapons receive adjustments that only affect Warzone. The ISO 9mm submachine gun and the TR-76 Geist assault r

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage Is Ubisoft's Best-Selling PS5/Xbox Series X|S Game At Launch
description:
Ubisoft has provided new details regarding the launch of Assassin's Creed Mirage, and it sounds like the game is performing well. After its first six days, Mirage has become the "biggest new-gen launch" based on unit sales for Ubisoft across PS5 and Xbox Series X|S.

Ubisoft did not announce any specific sales figures in its statement, but the company said Mirage has reached player numbers that are "in line" with the launches of Assassin's Creed Origins and Odyssey. "We are humbled by the positive reception" to Mirage, Ubisoft said.

Ubisoft did not mention Assassin's Creed Valhalla, so it's likely Mirage didn't meet or exceed that game's performance at launch, but in any event, it sounds like Mirage is doing well so far.

title: WoW Players Raise $1.5 Million For Ukraine Relief Efforts By Adopting Virtual Pets
description:
World of Warcraft players raised $1.5 million for Ukrainian relief efforts from late July to late August, developer Blizzard has announced.

Blizzard offered a $20 WoW pet bundle for a limited time to raise the funds, with players unlocking Sunny the Golden Retriever in the modern version of WoW and Flurky the Murloc in WoW: Wrath of the Lich King Classic. The two pets were specially created to invoke the national colors of Ukraine, with Flurky holding a sunflower, Ukraine's national flower.

Blizzard additionally partnered with Ukrainian-born actress Mila Kunis to promote the fundraising effort. Kunis, be

title: Sony Headphones Are On Sale During Prime Day Round 2
description:
Amazon's Big Deal Days event continues today with even more discounts on a range of products at the online retail giant. If you're in the market for some new headphones, a range of Sony headphones are discounted, but you may need to act quickly to score a deal.

The marquee offer is on the Sony WH-1000XM4 wireless headphones. These overheard headphones have excellent noise cancelling, a mic for communication, and up to 30 hours of battery life on a single charge. The headphones also can detect when you're wearing them and will pause playback when you take them off. They can also be paired to multiple devices and come with the ability to create personalized audio settings to your liking.

title: X Rocker's Mario Gaming Chair Is On Sale At Amazon
description:
There are plenty of great deals left in Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days event, like this discount on X Rocker's Super Mario-themed gaming chair for kids that drops the price to just $212.50 (down from $250) for the remainder of the sale, which wraps up at the end of today.

The X Rocker Super Mario Video Gaming Pedestal Chair's big feature is its audio capabilities, sporting a speaker built into the headrest and a subwoofer mounted in the back. The chair includes a volume control panel with digital audio and 3.5mm headpho

title: Marvel Studios Is Overhauling How It Makes TV, Daredevil Writers Fired - Report
description:
Daredevil: Born Again is undergoing a significant creative overhaul, according to The Hollywood Reporter. Head writers Chris Ord and Matt Corman have been let go, and the production is reportedly seeking new writers to breathe new life into the show.

According to the report, Marvel Studios used the writers' strike as an opportunity to evaluate the show's current footage. With input from Chief Kevin Feige, it became evident that the series was not meeting expectations. Corman and Ord apparently crafted a legal procedural that diverged from the more action-packed Netflix version. Charlie Cox, portraying Matt Murdock, didn't don his costume until the fourth episode, leading Marvel to reconsider the show's initial concept, despite having already given it the green light. By late September, "fewer than half of the series' 18 episodes" were filmed, but that was enough

title: Amazon Prime Day Has Big Discounts On Bandai's Star Wars, Dragon Ball, And Naruto Action Figures
description:
You might have fond memories of your GI Joe and Teenage Mutant Ninja toys, but compared to what's available today, they're practically inaction figures. Amazon Prime Day Round 2 is almost over, but if you're looking to score some excellent collectibles for your shelf that have a wide range of articulation that you can play with when no one is watching you, then you won't want to miss out on these deals for Bandai's line of SH Figuarts toys.

As mentioned above, these action figures have a silly amount of articulation, allowing you to strike some cool poses with them. They also have an impressive amount of detail in their sculpts, come with a wide range of extras, and they're pocket-sized. We're not saying that taking a Super Saiyan Rose Goku Black to work and spending your lunch break putting it in a perfectly menacing pose will help relieve some office stress, but it can't hurt to try.

title: Brighten Up Your Game Room With These Discounted Nintendo Lights
description:
Looking for a fun way to light up your game room? Then you’ll want to check out these gorgeous Nintendo-inspired lamps, lights, and alarm clocks from Paladone--all of which are currently discounted for Prime Big Deal Days (Prime Day Round 2).

The Legend of Zelda: Master Sword Light is one of the coolest products seeing a price cut. Down to just $32 (regularly $40), it’s designed to look like the Master Sword stuck inside a stone. You’ll find a button on the base to activate a light, but it’s a great piece of home décor whether or not it’s illuminated.

title: PS Plus Extra And Premium Games For October 2023 Go Hard On Horror
description:
A new wave of games included with the PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium memberships are coming on October 17, offering up plenty of scares just in time for Halloween.

Sony's just-announced lineup goes heavy on horror games, with Alien: Isolation, Dead Island: Definitive Edition, Outlast 2, and The Dark Pictures Anthology: House of Ashes all joining the service soon. For those who aren't a fan of being scared, there's still a wide variety of titles for players to check out. One of 2019's most critically

title: Baldur's Gate 3 Review - Let Freedom Reign
description:
Baldur's Gate 3 pushes player freedom to the absolute limit. That unparalleled level of freedom can be found in nearly every aspect of the game, from its character creation to combat, and after two full playthroughs and a dozen ongoing campaigns, I've still barely scratched the surface. No two experiences are alike, and every character I've created feels unique. While the game can't always keep up with the spontaneity of a real-life Dungeon Master, it manages to offer plenty of agency while also ensuring that its vast, web-like narrative is compelling from start to finish.

Baldur's Gate 3 begins in the belly of a Nautiloid, a Lovecraftian spaceship piloted by a squid-like race known as illithids. After you create your avatar and pick a class, you are infected with a parasite that slowly (and painfully) turns its host into a tentacle-adorned mind flayer. You and the other affected members of your party must find a way to remove the parasites before the tra

title: Valve Is Ending Counter-Strike 2 Support For Mac And Older Systems
description:
Valve has announced that it is dropping support for Counter-Strike 2 on DirectX9 and 32-bit operating systems, as well as macOS. Valve said that combined, these users represented less than one percent of active CS:Go players.

"Moving forward, Counter-Strike 2 will exclusively support 64-bit Windows and Linux," Valve explained in a statement. "If you are unable to launch Counter-Strike 2 with your current hardware, you can access a legacy version of CS:GO. Support for this version of CS:GO will end on January 1, 2024."

The legacy version is a frozen build of the game and has all of its features except for official matchmaking. It will still be available after January 1, 2024, but certain functionality that relies on compatibility with the game coordinator, like access to inventory, may degrade or fail.

title: Grab All 15 Wheel Of Time Novels For A Bargain Price At Amazon
description:
With a new season of The Wheel of Time streaming on Amazon's Prime Video service, now is a great time to check out author Robert Jordan's award-winning book series. For Amazon Prime Day Round 2, you can pump up your library with a rich amount of fantasy thanks to some big discounts on the premium book box sets. title: Save Big On A Foosball Table, Corn Hole, Table Tennis, And More For Prime Day Round 2
description:
Amazon's huge Big Deal Days event is now in its second and final day, and if you're looking for a good deal, there are tons available. A number of party games are discounted nicely during the sale event, including a foosball table, dart board, corn hole, air hockey, table tennis, and more.

Amazon has the Best Choice Products foosball table in a light brown color for $110, a nice discount from its standard $150 price. The 48-inch table made of composite wood and steel rods connecting the legs to help the table stay sturdy when games get... intense. The table weighs 42 pounds and also comes with two balls and a pair of cup holders. This model was originally released in 2016.

title: Nintendo Switch Exclusives Get Big Discounts For Prime Day
description:
Nintendo Switch exclusives rarely see discounts. In fact, it’s not uncommon to see games that launched several years ago still hovering around their original price. That’s not the case during Prime Big Deal Days (Prime Day Round 2), however, as dozens of Switch exclusives are seeing massive discounts.

One of the best price cuts available right now is for The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, which is $48 (down from $70). Its sprawling open world, unique crafting mechanics, and iconic story have it in the running for GOTY--and snagging it for $48 is a steal.

title: Metroid Dread Amiibo Figures Get A Rare Discount For Prime Day
description:
After the dust had settled from the Toys to Life genre wars, Nintendo was the last company standing with its line of Amiibo figures. Compared to the competition, Amiibos looked better, offered more in-game value, and quickly became sought-after collectibles. While they rarely go on sale, you can grab a lovely two-pack of Amiibo figures for 20% less during Amazon Prime Day Round 2, and this is one set that Metroid fans will want to add to their collection.

  • Nintendo Metroid Dread Amiibo -- $24 ($30)

title: Wild Card Football Review - Undrafted
description:
In the US, autumn belongs to football. The sport takes over pop culture in a way no other can match, and after decades of growth, it seems to still be getting more popular. So surely there's room for a second licensed football game on the market, especially when the industry leader is itself so polarizing. That's where Wild Card Football hopes to exist: in the abundant space devoted to football fandom that could host either a Madden alternative, or more likely, a side attraction. Unfortunately, this much more cartoonish take on the sport doesn't quite make the roster, though it's not without a few highlights.

Wild Card Football is an arcade-style football game in the vein of NBA Playgrounds and WWE 2K Battlegrounds. In fact, it comes from the same studio, Saber Interactive, and is billed as part of the broader Playground Sports brand. Somewhere between the enjoyable basketball game and the s

title: Star Wars Legion Tabletop Game Is Far, Far Below Retail Price At Amazon
description:
Star Wars is hotter than ever thanks to recent Disney+ shows like The Mandalorian, The Bad Batch, and Ahsoka Tano, and if you're looking to bring some of that magic home for a tabletop session or two, then you're in luck. title: Neon Genesis Evangelion Blu-Rays And PC Hardware Get A Big Prime Day Discount
description:
It might be closing in on its 30th anniversary, but Neon Genesis Evangelion is an enduring anime franchise that has expanded well beyond the confines of analogue TVs. For Amazon Prime Day Round 2, Evangelion fans can grab a bunch of terrific deals on Blu-rays of the classic anime series, its recent animated feature film remakes, and even some of the stylish PC gaming hardware that Asus released.

Starting off with Evangelion: Thrice Upon a Time, this new release is available in both a 4K UHD and regular Blu-ray format. The final chapter in the Rebuild of Evangelion project that began in 2007, this conclusion to the saga comes with some great extras in its limited-edition release. It packs in a 4K UHD disc and two Blu-ray discs, a 28-page book, a 16.5″ x 11.7″ poster, and five art cards, while the 1080p edition has two Blu-ray discs with both the English and Japanese language versions of the movie for fans to enjoy

title: Tons Of Mini PCs Are On Sale During Prime Big Deal Days
description:
Mini PCs are a great option for folks working with limited desktop space. Not only do they offer many of the same features found on their larger siblings, but they’re usually highly affordable and small enough to cram onto even the most crowded surface. During Prime Big Deal Days, you can pick up a variety of mini PCs at some of the lowest prices of the year.

One of the standout deals is for Beelink SEI12, which is now just $299 (down from $409). Boasting an Intel Core i5 processor, 500GB SSD, and 16GB RAM, it’s powerful enough to handle tasks like surfing the web, streaming movies, or writing up a lab report without any lag. title: PS5 Cloud Streaming Is Coming This Month
description:
Sony has announced that PlayStation 5 Cloud Streaming will arrive later this month for PlayStation Plus Premium Members. Sony will begin launching the functionality for supported digital titles within the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog and Game Trials, as well as select titles members already own.

Sony is planning on launching cloud streaming in Japan on October 17, in Europe on October 23, and in North America on October 30. Only a few titles will be supported at the beginning, such as Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales, Ghost of Tsushima, and Mortal Kombat 11, but more games will receive cloud streaming functionality later on.

Game Trials for PS5 games like The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, Hogwarts Legacy, and The Callisto Protocol will be supported too. Digital games such as Resident Evil 4, Dead Island 2, and Genshin Impac

description:
Amazon might have tons of great deals on video games and electronics during Prime Big Deal Days (Prime Day Round 2), but it’s also offering huge price cuts on books. Specifically, dozens of boxed sets are on sale--including The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia for $59 and the Dune Saga for $42.

title: Nintendo Switch Update Blocks Slang Words For Testicles In Japanese
description:
A new firmware update for the Nintendo Switch is out now, but don't expect much in the way of major changes. Version 17.0.0 is focused mainly on system stability. It has also been discovered that the update adds more blocked words to the database, including slang for testicles.

The one-line patch notes posted on Nintendo's website state that the update includes "general system stability improvements to enhance the user's experience." As usual, though, that's not the whole story.

Twitter user OatmealDome, who is known for finding more changes under the hood, dug into the code and apparently discovered some additional changes, including new error code messages and updated time zone data. Additionally, this person reports that the update adds more words to the banned word l

title: Fill Your Minecraft Library With These Prime Day Deals
description:
A treasure trove of Minecraft books are on sale for Prime Day, including novels, graphic novels, and guides. Many of the boxed sets are nearly or even more than half off, so it's a good time to catch up on all your block-based reading.

title: Elder Scrolls Online Boss Thinks A Live-Action Movie Would Be "Cool"
description:
With Fallout already getting a TV series next year on Amazon, speculation turns to another massive Bethesda video game property getting a live-action adaptation: The Elder Scrolls. Nothing is officially in the works. However, the creative director behind the popular Elder Scrolls Online sounds supportive of a movie or animated show in the future.

Speaking with Dextero, Rich Lambert provided his perspective on a feature film or even TV series for The Elder Scrolls. "I think it would be cool if we could do it," he said. "I just don't know how we would."

Bethesda's Fallout franchise will come to Amazon Prime in 2024 as a TV series, with the first footage being showcased at G

title: The Witcher Book Box Set Is Steeply Discounted At Amazon
description:
Long before The Witcher was a mega-popular Netflix TV series or an award-winning series of video games, it was a series of books written by Andrzej Sapkowski. The Polish author's work would later be adapted by CD Projekt Red into a trilogy of well-received games, and later, a hit series starring Henry Cavill as the silver sword-slinging mercenary, but for anyone wanting to experience the roots of this dark fantasy series, then these Amazon Prime Day Round 2 sales will get you up to speed.

  • The Witcher Box Set (8 books) -- $44 ($80)

title: Lord Of The Rings Book Box Sets Drop To Low Prices For Prime Day
description:
Lord of the Rings remains as popular as ever, as J.R.R. Tolkien's sweeping tale of Hobbits, Urak-Hai, and rings of power continues to be the subject of games, movies, and TV shows. If you haven't read the source material or are looking for a nice gift this holiday, a bunch of box sets and editions of Tolkien's beloved fantasy series are on sale during Prime Day Round 2.

For a no-fuss collection of paperbacks, then you can pick up a four-book set for as little as $12.49 from Amazon. This includes The Hobbit and all three volumes of LOTR: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Two Towers, and The Return of the King. That's 1,728 pages of fantasy, all neatly packaged in one portable box set for $12.49, a massive savings from its $36 list price.

The discount brings the price down to $50 for the Glacier White and Camouflage Green controllers. The other colors are not on sale, however. You can use the links below to order a new DualShock 4 for yourself through Amazon. This is a pretty nice discount, as the controllers normally go for $65.

Of note is that these are brand-new DualShock 4 controllers, which are somewhat rare these days as the PS4 ages and deals are more common for refurbished units.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

If you're looking to dive into the source material--author George R.R. Martin's books--then you can score a big Prime Day deal on the series.

The package normally goes for $65, but Amazon has it marked down by 37% to $41 right now for the sale. Shipping is free and fast for Prime members. You can order it via the link below.

See on Amazon

The 40th anniversary gift set comes with E.T. the movie in 4K on Blu-ray, as well as a digital copy of the film. There are lots and lots of bonus features, too, spread across two discs. This includes deleted scenes, interviews with Spielberg and composer John Williams, and plenty more.

Amazon is selling the plastic toy from the Halo series for only $70. That's a nice 30% discount off its normal $100 price point. Prime members can fast two-day shipping for free. You can order the item for yourself through the link below.

See at Amazon

The Nerf Needler replica fires Nerf darts and comes with 10 Nerf Elite darts as well as a display stand to show off the item. The needs on the gun light up when you grip the handle. Note that the gun requires six AA batteries, and they are not included with the blaster.

title: Activision Hires James Corden For All-Hands Meeting Where Bobby Kotick Discusses AI, Elon Musk, And Guitar Hero - Report
description:
With Microsoft's blockbuster $68.7 billion deal to acquire Activision Blizzard reportedly looking to close this Friday, October 13, the Call of Duty company reportedly held an all-hands meeting this week where CEO Bobby Kotick discussed his vision for the future of video games. According to Windows Central, Activision Blizzard hired late night TV host and actor James Corden to host.

title: Get This Star Wars Ultimate Collector Series Lego Set Deal Before It Sells Out
description:
This week is an excellent time to grab discounted Lego sets online thanks to Amazon Prime Day Round 2 (Big Deal Days) and Walmart's Holiday Kickoff sale. We've rounded up the best deals on Star Wars, Batman, and Marvel Lego sets below.

Below, you'll find lists for both retailers, though most of the deals are the same, as Amazon is price-matching Walmart's sale. One of the lone exceptions is the massive Lego Star Wars The Mandalorian set featuring the Razor Crest. This set is part of Lego's Ultimate Collectors Series and is likely to sell out quickly at its discounted price of $480 (normally $600).
